scripts.deploy:poly: pnpm prepare:poly && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ anudit/tableland-polygon
scripts.deploy:mumbai: pnpm prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ anudit/tableland
scripts.deploy:opeth: pnpm prepare:opeth && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ anudit/tableland-optimism
scripts.deploy:op: pnpm prepare:op && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ anudit/tableland-optimism-goerli
scripts.deploy:arb: pnpm prepare:arb && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ anudit/tableland-arbitrum-goerli
scripts.deploy:all: pnpm deploy:poly && pnpm deploy:mumbai && pnpm deploy:opeth && pnpm deploy:op && pnpm deploy:arb && pnpm deploy:eth && pnpm deploy:goerli
